lines.text: I caught the sound of faintly spoken words
as nervously I paced the church's aisle.
It was a bridesmaid that I'd overheard
who said unto the steward something vile.
she happ'ly said, ere furtively she bade,
"Though 'tis a pity that it's all for naught,
for groom has been by bride a cuckold made!"
As what does not exist cannot expire,
the marriage had by happenstance been sav'd;
